ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Hate Lists
ygData.msgSnippet: If someone else in the group was the real hate list culprit, generally a finger twiddler who isn t going anywhere near the fort, then your song pulse puts you
ygData.messageBody:
If someone else in the group was the real hate list culprit, generally a
finger twiddler who isn't going anywhere near the fort, then your song pulse
puts you on the list too. I suspect this is how the charm thing was
occurring.

-----Original Message-----
From: Big Daddy Legba [mailto:legba@...]
Sent: Friday, June 09, 2000 12:21 PM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Hate Lists


When it was first occuring we thought maybe I somehow got on the whole
fort's hate list (possibly another group's mob wandered into my AOE then
killed them and walked into the fort, tell them about this little punk half
elf outside)

So I zoned (twice actually, as I had to run right after getting back). No
change, as soon as I came up to the group, Giants just starting charging out
of the fort...

I am not going to sue charm and see if it still happenes tonight.
